name: logseq-interstitial-heading-plugin
author: Alex Qwxlea
description: Interstitial Journaling plugin. Insert a (bold) timestamps, random notes, or notes to self.

scripts.preview: gh-social-preview.py -t "Logseq Interstial Journaling Plugin" -e "Solves procrastination, helps with decision making and makes you totally productive" -i "background.png" -f "BebasNeue-Regular.ttf" -b "Montserrat-VariableFont_wght.ttf" -l icon2.png -v "$npm_package_version"
